Posts.Content: Oct 10, 2009 08:04PM kaykay001 wrote: I am sooooo sorry about your little girl.  I have a 12 year old daughter and my heart really goes out for her and all of you.  I was devastated with my own recent diagnosis, but now feel very fortunate for myself at 48.  I will be keeping your and your family in my prayers.  May God wrap his loving arms around all of you.....sending lots of hugs.
Posts.Title: HELP! 10 year old with bc cjsocal Mary-Lou
